body: @arkenel By this I do not mean that infidelity does not exist in Japan, where the wife can cheat on her husband of her own free will. But the issue I am talking about is sexual slavery. The authorities will not be informed, but this does not indicate that she is living paradise in that life.

@arkenfel By the term <whore> I meant that the woman would feel pleasure and accept her new life being <happy> (as we often see in the NTR). There is blackmail, rape as well, sexual slavery as well, but a person who has been forced never finds happiness as the NTR shows.

@haitoku you are right i came to know this as well, Japan has  a cheating culture, the men openly cheat. In marriage but NTR is a fantasy for women because in reality, even if they or the husband cheat. They do not divorce, because of shame divorce is rare in Japan. I still hate this genre with a passion, the fact the woman pretend to love her husband while fuck other guys that shit rubs me the wrong way.

You know I'm read some poll and find out women (in japan) most reader NTR genre.(read long time but forgot bookmark this poll) That why most story end like FMC get happy life. Like story married couple even her husband find out that she had sex with another guy he did not sue her and let's her walk out clean. Since target sell is women.

@arkenfel Partly realistic, my friend, as Japanese women will not become the whores of their rapists. There is a difference from Japanese female passivity and their re-creation of it in hentai, as all negative <human> post-rape symptoms are omitted from hentai. It´s more simply in hentai.

I know i am ranting but it really bugs me the Japanese style of rape, my dick is limp when the story victim just accepts it. That is  boring true rape is where the victim makes you work for it, if there is no effort on the female my dick won't get hard. There has go to be be biting and a intense struggle as you are trying to get her panties off. holding her down in a way she cannot escape, while trying to guide your dick in her and, trying to stop her biting and punching you. And when you do enter her and start a nice easy going rhythm there has to be crying. Now all of this sounds fucked up but that is what real rape is, this shit is just a cartoon. They should do some real shit for once, because this stuff is just boring, I cannot fap to this i cannot lie to myself when deep down i know it is bullshit.

This is realistic for Japan, women there accept rape they do not tell the police. The idea of the rapist taking evidence and blackmailer her is spot on, even down to the woman not fighting back during the rape is spot on. But for many of us in the west the story seems too much of a fantasy, in the west women would fight back they just don't lie there and accept it. That is what I do not like about these stories, I do not want the bitch to lie there, and worst of all i do not want her to enjoy it. As weak as Japanese  women are I do not even think they would enjoy the rape. I n the west there is no way you could rape a woman and she would not tell the police, and the idea that you would go back for round 2 hahah is daft. It would be good if they could do a really good rape story.
